concept.title: Using PINs on different systems
concept.shortdesc: CCA allows you to translate different PIN block formats, which lets you use personal identification numbers on different systems.

conbody.p:
CCA supports the following formats:
IBM 3624
IBM 3621 (same as IBM 5906)
IBM 4704 encrypting PINPAD format
ISO 0 (same as ANSI 9.8, VISA 1, and ECI 1)
ISO 1 (same as ECI 4)
ISO 2
ISO 3
ISO 4
VISA 2
VISA 3
VISA 4
ECI 2
ECI 3
The algorithms are described in detail in .
